post.author: 권경화
post.content:
차상철씨(chasc)가 새 회원으로 가입하셨읍니다. 환영합니다. 신민용씨, 정 회원으로 바꿔 주시면 감사하겠읍니다.
혹시 관련된 job이 있으면 차상철씨 에게도 보내주세요 sangchual.cha@gmail.com
=================================================== ● Solid Business Knowledge and Experience with BPM and ECM System Development in Banking Industry. ● 10 years of Desktop Application Programming Experience with C/C++, VB and Java. ● 2 years of Web and Rich Internet Application Programming Experience with Ajax and Flex. ● Document Management Application Development and Image Processing Library Implementation. ● TDD and Software Testing Qualification with ISTQB Certification. ● Deep Understanding of OOAD, CBD and Design Patterns principles. ● Chair of RIA WG (Rich Internet Application Working Group) in OMG ● Strong System Problem Determination, Troubleshooting and Resolution Skills.
post.title: 새회원 차상철씨
